elements.text: At a work meeting, you forget the answer to an important question. Your colleagues exchange glances that leave you unsure about how they perceive your capabilities and HD symptoms. However, one colleague offers to fill you in, and you think that your colleagues are...

elements.name: Question at Work_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
